globalAttributes.name: data-typewriter
globalAttributes.description: Text to display with typewriter animation. Example: data-typewriter="Hello World!"

globalAttributes.name: data-typewriter-speed
globalAttributes.description: Typing speed in milliseconds (default: 100). Example: data-typewriter-speed="50"

globalAttributes.name: data-typewriter-delay
globalAttributes.description: Delay before starting in milliseconds (default: 0). Example: data-typewriter-delay="500"

globalAttributes.name: data-typewriter-cursor
globalAttributes.description: Show/hide cursor (default: true). Example: data-typewriter-cursor="false"

globalAttributes.name: data-typewriter-style
globalAttributes.description: Typewriter visual style. Example: data-typewriter-style="cmd"

values.name: hacker
values.description: Matrix hacker style with glitch effects

globalAttributes.name: data-typewriter-loop
globalAttributes.description: Loop the typing animation. Example: data-typewriter-loop="true"

globalAttributes.name: data-theme-switcher
globalAttributes.description: Enable theme switching on a <select> element. Auto-saves to localStorage.

globalAttributes.name: data-active-state
globalAttributes.description: Enable active state management for navigation links. Adds 'active' class to clicked link.

globalAttributes.name: data-smooth-scroll
globalAttributes.description: Enable smooth scrolling for anchor links. Example: <a href="#section" data-smooth-scroll>

globalAttributes.name: data-modal-open
globalAttributes.description: ID of modal to open on click. Example: data-modal-open="myModal"

globalAttributes.name: data-modal-close
globalAttributes.description: Close the current modal when clicked. Add to buttons inside modals.

globalAttributes.name: data-tab
globalAttributes.description: ID of tab panel to show. Example: data-tab="tab1"

globalAttributes.name: data-tabs
globalAttributes.description: Enable tab functionality for container. Add to parent element.

globalAttributes.name: data-validate
globalAttributes.description: Enable form validation. Add to <form> element.

globalAttributes.name: data-validate-email
globalAttributes.description: Validate input as email format. Add to email input fields.

globalAttributes.name: data-scroll-reveal
globalAttributes.description: Reveal element when scrolled into view with fade-in effect.

globalAttributes.name: data-scroll-animate
globalAttributes.description: Trigger animation when scrolled into view. Example: data-scroll-animate="fade-up"

globalAttributes.name: data-scroll-delay
globalAttributes.description: Delay before scroll animation in milliseconds. Example: data-scroll-delay="200"

globalAttributes.name: data-copy
globalAttributes.description: Text to copy to clipboard on click. Example: data-copy="npm install"

globalAttributes.name: data-animate
globalAttributes.description: Animation to play on page load. Example: data-animate="fade"

globalAttributes.name: data-animate-delay
globalAttributes.description: Delay before animation starts in milliseconds. Example: data-animate-delay="300"

globalAttributes.name: data-tooltip
globalAttributes.description: Tooltip text to display on hover. Example: data-tooltip="Click to copy"

globalAttributes.name: data-dropdown
globalAttributes.description: Enable dropdown functionality. Add to parent container.

globalAttributes.name: data-dropdown-trigger
globalAttributes.description: Element that triggers the dropdown. Add to button.

globalAttributes.name: data-dropdown-content
globalAttributes.description: Dropdown content panel. Add to dropdown menu.

globalAttributes.name: data-lazy-src
globalAttributes.description: Image source for lazy loading. Example: data-lazy-src="image.jpg"

globalAttributes.name: data-parallax
globalAttributes.description: Parallax scroll speed multiplier. Example: data-parallax="0.5" (slower) or data-parallax="1.5" (faster)

globalAttributes.name: data-hamburger
globalAttributes.description: Enable hamburger menu functionality. Add to hamburger button.

globalAttributes.name: data-mobile-menu
globalAttributes.description: Mobile menu panel. Add to nav menu that appears on mobile.
